entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this afternoon then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
